verbose_text: Furthermore, TXNIP knockdown also restores redox proteins, such as Trx1 and Trx2, as well as mitophagy adaptors Optn and p62 / SQSTM1 under HG conditions (XREF_FIG D and their densitometric quantitation in Fig. S7).
evidence: TXNIP knockdown also restores redox proteins, such as Trx1 and Trx2, as well as mitophagy adaptors Optn and p62/SQSTM1
